title: Controlling attosecond electron dynamics by phase-stabilized polarization gating
title_cn: 通过相位稳定的极化门控来控制阿秒电子动力学
abstract: Attosecond electron wavepackets are produced when an intense laser field ionizes an atom or a molecule. When the laser field drives the wavepackets back to the parent ion, they interfere with the bound wavefunction, producing coherent subfemtosecond extreme-ultraviolet light bursts. When only a single return is possible, an isolated attosecond pulse is generated. Here we demonstrate that by modulating the polarization of a carrier-envelope phase-stabilized short laser pulse, we can finely control the electron-wavepacket dynamics. We use high-order harmonic generation to probe these dynamics. Under optimized conditions, we observe the signature of a single return of the electron wavepacket over a large range of energies. This temporally confines the extreme-ultraviolet emission to an isolated attosecond pulse with a broad and tunable bandwidth. Our approach is very general, and extends the bandwidth of attosecond isolated pulses in such a way that pulses of a few attoseconds seem achievable. Similar temporal resolution could also be achieved by directly using the broadband electron wavepacket. This opens up a new regime for time-resolved tomography of atomic or molecular wavefunctions and ultrafast dynamics.
abstract_cn: 当强激光场使原子或分子电离时，会产生阿秒电子波包。当激光场将波包驱动回母离子时，它们会干扰束缚的波函数，产生相干的亚飞秒级极紫外光突发。当仅可能返回一个信号时，将生成一个隔离的阿秒脉冲。在这里，我们证明了通过调制载流子相位稳定的短激光脉冲的偏振，我们可以精细地控制电子波包的动力学。我们使用高次谐波产生来探究这些动力学。在优化的条件下，我们观察到电子波包在大范围能量上的单次返回的特征。这在时间上将极紫外光发射限制为具有宽且可调带宽的孤立的阿秒脉冲。我们的方法非常通用，并且以一种似乎可以实现几阿秒脉冲的方式扩展了阿秒隔离脉冲的带宽。通过直接使用宽带电子波包也可以实现类似的时间分辨率。这为原子或分子波函数和超快动力学的时间分辨层析成像打开了一个新机制。

title: Attosecond electron wave packet interferometry
abstract: Acomplete quantum-mechanical description of matter and its interaction with the environment requires detailed knowledge of a number of complex parameters. In particular, information about the phase of wavefunctions is important for predicting the behaviour of atoms, molecules or larger systems. In optics, information about the evolution of the phase of light in time and space is obtained by interferometry. To obtain similar information for atoms and molecules, it is vital to develop analogous techniques. Here we present an interferometric method for determining the phase variation of electronic wave packets in momentum space, and demonstrate its applicability to the fundamental process of single-photon ionization. We use a sequence of extreme-ultraviolet attosecond pulses to ionize argon atoms and an infrared laser field, which induces a momentum shear between consecutive electron wave packets. The interferograms that result from the interaction of these wave packets provide useful information about their phase. This technique opens a promising new avenue for reconstructing the wavefunctions of atoms and molecules and for following the ultrafast dynamics of electronic wave packets.
abstract_cn: 对物质及其与环境的相互作用的完整的量子力学描述需要对许多复杂参数的详细了解。特别是，有关波函数相位的信息对于预测原子，分子或更大系统的行为很重要。在光学中，通过干涉法可以获得有关光在时间和空间中的演变的信息。为了获得原子和分子的相似信息，开发相似的技术至关重要。在这里，我们提出了一种用于确定动量空间中电子波包相位变化的干涉方法，并证明了其在单光子电离基本过程中的适用性。我们使用一系列极紫外阿秒脉冲使氩原子电离，并使用红外激光场，这会在连续的电子波包之间引起动量剪切。这些波包相互作用产生的干涉图提供了有关其相位的有用信息。该技术为重构原子和分子的波函数，并遵循电子波包的超快动力学特性开辟了广阔的前景。

title: Determination of the carrier-envelope phase of few-cycle laser pulses with terahertz-emission spectroscopy
title_cn: 太赫兹发射光谱法测定几周期激光脉冲的载流子包络相
abstract: The availability of few-cycle optical pulses opens a window to physical phenomena occurring on the attosecond timescale. To take full advantage of such pulses, it is crucial to measure and stabilize their carrier-envelope (CE) phase, that is, the phase difference between the carrier wave and the envelope function. We introduce an approach to determine the CE phase by down-conversion of the laser light to the terahertz (THz) frequency range by means of plasma generation in ambient air, an isotropic medium where optical rectification (down-conversion) in the forward direction is only possible if the inversion symmetry is broken by electrical or optical means. We show that few-cycle pulses directly produce a spatial charge asymmetry in the plasma. The asymmetry, associated with THz emission, depends on the CE phase, which allows determination of the phase by measurement of the amplitude and polarity of the THz pulse.
abstract_cn: 几个周期的光脉冲的可用性打开了一个窗口，可以了解在十亿分之一秒尺度上发生的物理现象。 为了充分利用此类脉冲，至关重要的是测量并稳定其载波包络（CE）相位，即载波和包络函数之间的相位差。 我们介绍了一种通过在环境空气中产生等离子体的方式将激光下转换为太赫兹（THz）频率范围来确定CE相位的方法，该等向性介质的正向光学整流（下转换）是 仅当通过电学或光学手段破坏反演对称性时才有可能。 我们表明，几个周期的脉冲直接在等离子体中产生空间电荷不对称性。 与THz发射相关的不对称性取决于CE相位，从而可以通过测量THz脉冲的幅度和极性来确定相位。

title: A Stern–Gerlach experiment for slow light
abstract: Electromagnetically induced transparency allows light transmission through dense atomic media by means of quantum interference. Media with electromagnetically induced transparency have very interesting properties, such as extremely slow group velocities. Quasiparticles, the so-called dark polaritons, which are mixtures of a photonic and an atomic contribution, are associated with slow light propagation. Here, we demonstrate that these excitations behave as particles with a non-zero magnetic moment, which is in clear contrast to the properties of a free photon. It is found that light passing through a rubidium gas cell, under the conditions of electromagnetically induced transparency, is deflected by a small magnetic field gradient. The deflection angle is proportional to the optical propagation time through the cell. The beam deflection observed can be understood by assuming that dark-state polaritons have an effective magnetic moment. Our experiment can be described in terms of a Stern–Gerlach experiment for the polaritons.
abstract_cn: 电磁感应的透明性允许光通过量子干扰通过密集的原子介质传输。具有电磁感应透明度的介质具有非常有趣的属性，例如极慢的组速度。准粒子，即所谓的暗极化子，是光子和原子贡献的混合物，与缓慢的光传播有关。在这里，我们证明了这些激发表现为具有非零磁矩的粒子，这与自由光子的性质形成鲜明对比。发现在电磁感应的透明性的条件下，穿过a气室的光被较小的磁场梯度偏转。偏转角与通过单元的光学传播时间成正比。假定暗态极化子具有有效的磁矩，可以理解观察到的电子束偏转。我们的实验可以用极化子的Stern＆＃8211; Gerlach实验来描述。

title: Correlation-induced inhomogeneity in circular quantum dots
title_cn: 圆量子点中由相关引起的不均匀性
abstract: Properties of the ‘electron gas’—in which conduction electrons interact by means of Coulomb forces but ionic potentials are neglected—change dramatically depending on the balance between kinetic energy and Coulomb repulsion. The limits are well understood. For very weak interactions (high density), the system behaves as a Fermi liquid, with delocalized electrons. In contrast, in the strongly interacting limit (low density), the electrons localize and order into a Wigner crystal phase. The physics at intermediate densities, however, remains a subject of fundamental research. Here, we study the intermediate-density electron gas confined to a circular disc, where the degree of confinement can be tuned to control the density. Using accurate quantum Monte Carlo techniques, we show that the electron–electron correlation induced by an increase of the interaction first smoothly causes rings, and then angular modulation, without any signature of a sharp transition in this density range. This suggests that inhomogeneities in a confined system, which exist even without interactions, are significantly enhanced by correlations.
abstract_cn: 电子气的特性，其中导电电子借助库仑力相互作用，而离子势却被忽略，这取决于动能和库仑斥力之间的平衡。限制是众所周知的。对于非常弱的相互作用（高密度），系统的行为就像费米液体，带有离域电子。相反，在强相互作用极限（低密度）下，电子局部定位并排列成维格纳晶相。然而，中等密度的物理学仍然是基础研究的主题。在这里，我们研究了被限制在圆盘中的中等密度电子气，在这里可以调节限制度以控制密度。使用精确的量子蒙特卡洛技术，我们显示了由相互作用增加引起的电子相关性首先平滑地引起环，然后进行角度调制，而在此密度范围内没有任何急剧转变的迹象。这表明，即使没有相互作用，受限系统中的不均匀性也会通过相关性得到显着增强。

title: A toolbox for lattice-spin models with polar molecules
title_cn: 具有极性分子的晶格自旋模型的工具箱
abstract: There is growing interest in states of matter with topological order. These are characterized by highly stable ground states robust to perturbations that preserve the topology, and which support excitations with so-called anyonic statistics. Topologically ordered states can arise in two-dimensional lattice-spin models, which were proposed as the basis for a new class of quantum computation. Here, we show that the relevant hamiltonians for such spin lattice models can be systematically engineered with polar molecules stored in optical lattices, where the spin is represented by a single-valence electron of a heteronuclear molecule. The combination of microwave excitation with dipole–dipole interactions and spin–rotation couplings enables building a complete toolbox for effective two-spin interactions with designable range, spatial anisotropy and coupling strengths significantly larger than relevant decoherence rates. Finally, we illustrate two models: one with an energy gap providing for error-resilient qubit encoding, and another leading to topologically protected quantum memory.
abstract_cn: 人们对具有拓扑顺序的物质状态越来越感兴趣。它们的特征是高度稳定的基态，对保持拓扑结构的扰动具有鲁棒性，并且通过所谓的非调子统计来支持激发。拓扑有序状态可以出现在二维晶格自旋模型中，这被提议作为新型量子计算的基础。在这里，我们表明可以使用存储在光学晶格中的极性分子来系统设计此类自旋晶格模型的相关哈密尔顿，其中自旋由异核分子的单价电子表示。微波激发与偶极相互作用和自旋旋转耦合相结合，可以构建一个完整的工具箱，以有效的两轴相互作用，并且具有可设计的范围，空间各向异性和显着大于相关退相干率的耦合强度。最后，我们说明了两个模型：一个模型具有一个能隙，可提供错误恢复的qubit编码，另一个模型可提供受拓扑保护的量子内存。

title: Optimal dynamical range of excitable networks at criticality
title_cn: 临界状态下可激励网络的最佳动态范围
abstract: A recurrent idea in the study of complex systems is that optimal information processing is to be found near phase transitions. However, this heuristic hypothesis has few (if any) concrete realizations where a standard and biologically relevant quantity is optimized at criticality. Here we give a clear example of such a phenomenon: a network of excitable elements has its sensitivity and dynamic range maximized at the critical point of a non-equilibrium phase transition. Our results are compatible with the essential role of gap junctions in olfactory glomeruli and retinal ganglionar cell output. Synchronization and global oscillations also emerge from the network dynamics. We propose that the main functional role of electrical coupling is to provide an enhancement of dynamic range, therefore allowing the coding of information spanning several orders of magnitude. The mechanism could provide a microscopic neural basis for psychophysical laws.
abstract_cn: 研究复杂系统的一个经常性想法是，在相变附近找到最佳信息处理。 但是，这种启发式假设几乎没有（如果有的话）具体实现的标准和生物学相关量在关键时刻得到优化的情况。 在这里，我们给出这种现象的清晰示例：可激发元素网络在非平衡相变的临界点具有最大的灵敏度和动态范围。 我们的结果与嗅觉肾小球和视网膜神经节细胞输出中缝隙连接的基本作用是相容的。 同步和全局振荡也来自网络动态。 我们建议电耦合的主要功能是提供动态范围的增强，因此允许跨越几个数量级的信息编码。 该机制可以为心理生理规律提供微观的神经基础。
